meanings.definition: To happen or occur as a result of something else.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, a rainbow ensued in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Confusion ensued when the fire alarm went off unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: Laughter ensued when the puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Silence ensued as the teacher entered the noisy classroom.
meanings.sent5: Excitement ensued as the team scored the winning goal.

meanings.definition: To follow in order or come afterward.
meanings.sent1: Dinner ensued after the appetizers were served.
meanings.sent2: A sense of calmness ensued once the chaos settled down.
meanings.sent3: Giggles ensued as the children played a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: Darkness ensued as the sun set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: A feeling of relief ensued when the deadline was extended.
